SELECT SCD.CNTR_NO || SCD.CNTR_SN AS CNTR , SCD.CNTR_NO , SCD.CNTR_SN , CCB.CST_KNM , SCD.SELL_TP_CD , NVL(RAFB.DSN_WDRW_AMT, 0) AS DSN_WDRW_AMT , RAFB.DSN_WDRW_FNT_D , RAFB.FNT_YN , NVL(RAFB.DP_AMT, 0) AS DP_AMT , NVL(RAFB.UC_AMT, 0) AS UC_AMT , RAFB.DSN_WDRW_FNT_PRD_CD , OPB.PRTNR_KNM , RAFB.FST_RGST_USR_ID , RAFB.FST_RGST_DTM FROM TB_RVCL_AC_FNT_DSN_WDRW_BAS RAFB JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL SCD ON RAFB.CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND RAFB.CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN AND RAFB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCD.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS SCB ON SCD.CNTR_NO = SCB.CNTR_NO AND SCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN TB_CUBS_CST_BAS CCB ON SCB.CNTR_CST_NO = CCB.CST_NO AND CCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS OPB ON RAFB.FNL_MDFC_USR_ID = OPB.PRTNR_NO /* 조인 조건이 맞는지 */ AND OPB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE RAFB.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND RAFB.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn}
AND SCD.SELL_TP_CD = #{sellTpCd}

SELECT A.DP_TP_CD , A.FNIT_APR_RS_CD FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS SCB JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL SCD ON SCB.CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND SCD.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' JOIN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SCSB.DP_TP_CD , SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO , SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN , SCSB.FNIT_APR_RS_CD , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO , SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN ORDER BY SCSB.CNTR_STLM_ID DESC) AS RN FROM TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_REL SCSR JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_STLM_BAS SCSB /* 계약결제기본 */ ON SCSR.CNTR_STLM_ID = SCSB.CNTR_STLM_ID AND SCSB.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND SCSR.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE SCSR.DTL_CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND SCSR.DTL_CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} ) WHERE RN = 1 ) A ON A.DTL_CNTR_NO = SCD.CNTR_NO AND A.DTL_CNTR_SN = SCD.CNTR_SN
